creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: a: braided cotton tie with corn husk-type tassel; b: piece of hand-carved wood, slightly bowed; two hand carved combs attached to center; c-f: multiply strands of twisted hair--some strands knotted throughout; c has 7 hanks attached at top; d has 3 hanks; e and f each have one hank
dimension: 16 1/2 x 2 in. (41.91 x 5.08 cm) (a and b only)
title: Hair Comb with Wig
